member.name: M:HockeyApp.HockeyClient.Configure(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Func{System.Exception,System.String})
member.summary: Configures the HockeyClient with your app specific information
member.param: [optional] the base url of the hockeyapp server. Only needed if used with a private HockeyApp installation.
[optional] ID of the current user using your app, sent with crash-reports, can also be set via property.
[optional] contact info of the current user using your app, sent with crash-reports, can also be set via property.
[optional] description loader func to return an additional description for the exception

member.summary: Use for advanced usecases like building your own platform specific sdk based on HockeyClient
member.param: [optional] the base url of the hockeyapp server. Only needed if used with a private HockeyApp installation.
[optional] ID of the current user using your app, sent with crash-reports, can also be set via property.
[optional] contact info of the current user using your app, sent with crash-reports, can also be set via property.
[optional] useragent string to be used in communication with the HockeyApp server
